summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the execution of a third amendment to a grant agreement with the Seattle Housing Authority (SHA); accepting an additional $22,000 grant for the development of a new youth film project at the Yesler Terrace Community Center; increasing the expenditure authority in the Department's 1999 Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Parks and Recreation Fund therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
